turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order a Starbucks caffè mocha from the local Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. No creams or syrups.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size do you want that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering a grande caffe mocha with 2% milk and no whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and I need that one ordered at the Starbucks located at 123 Main Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande caffe mocha with 2% and no whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on 123 main street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 5 minuters.
